title: Apple's iPad Pro vs. Microsoft's Surface Pro - Renderings Gallery - newsR
text: Apple's 12.9-inch and 1.5 lb (700 grams) iPad Pro has been announced on September 9, and it should be released in November, starting at $799 for the 32 GB Wi-Fi only model and $1079 for the Wi-Fi + Cellular 128 GB. Meanwhile, Microsoft already has it Surface Pro 3 on the market, a 12-inch and 1.7 lb (800) beh... Â»
